workflow.name: Create custom PDF documents from templates with Gemini & Google Drive
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

## 1 ‚Äî What Does It Do / Which Problem Does It Solve?

This workflow turns Google Docs-based contract & form templates into **ready-to-sign PDFs in minutes**‚Äîall from a single chat flow.

- **Automates repetitive document creation.** Instead of copying a rental, sales, or NDA template and filling it by hand every time, the bot asks for the required values and fills them in.
- **Eliminates human error.** It lists every mandatory field so nothing is missed, and removes unnecessary clauses via conditional blocks.
- **Speeds up approvals.** The final draft arrives as a direct PDF link‚Äîone click to send for signing.
- **One template ‚Üí unlimited variations.** Every new template you drop in Drive is auto-listed with **zero workflow edits‚Äî**it scales effortlessly.
- **100 % no-code.** Runs on n8n + Google Apps Script‚Äîno extra backend, self-hosted or cloud.

---

## 2 ‚Äî How It Works (Detailed Flow)

1. üìù **Template Discovery**
    
    üìÇ The **TemplateList** node scans the Drive folder you specify via the `?mode=meta` endpoint and returns an `id / title / desc` list. The bot shows this list in chat.
    
2. üéØ **Selection & Metadata Fetch**
    
    The user types a template name.
    
    üîç **GetMetaData** opens the chosen Doc, extracts `META_JSON`, placeholders, and conditional blocks, then lists mandatory & optional fields.
    
3. üó£ **Data-Collection Loop**
    - The bot asks for every **placeholder** value.
    - For each **conditional block** it asks üü¢ **Yes** / üî¥ **No**.
        
        Answers are accumulated in a `data` JSON object.
        
4. ‚úÖ **Final Confirmation**
    
    The bot summarizes the inputs ‚Üí when the user clicks **Confirm**, the *DocProcess* sub-workflow starts.
    
5. ‚öôÔ∏è **DocProcess Sub-Workflow**
    
    
    | üîß Step | Node | Task |
    | --- | --- | --- |
    | 1 | **User Choice Match Check** | Verifies name‚ÄìID match; throws if wrong |
    | 2 | **GetMetaData (renew)** | Gets the latest placeholder list |
    | 3 | **Validate JSON Format** | Checks for missing / unknown fields |
    | 4 | **CopyTemplate** | Copies the Doc via Drive API |
    | 5 | **FillDocument** | Apps Script fills placeholders & removes blocks |
    | 6 | **Generate PDF Link** | Builds an `export?format=pdf` URL |
6. üìé **Delivery**
    
    The master agent sends **üîó Download PDF** & **‚úèÔ∏è Open Google Doc** links.
    
7. üö´ **Error Paths**
    - `status:"ERROR", missing:[‚Ä¶]` ‚Üí bot lists missing fields and re-asks.
    - `unknown:[‚Ä¶]` ‚Üí template list is outdated; rerun *TemplateList*.
    - Any Apps Script error ‚Üí the returned `message` is shown verbatim in chat.

---

## 3 ‚Äî üöÄ Setup Steps (Full Checklist)

> Goal: Get a flawless PDF on the first run.
> 
> 
> Mentally **tick** the ‚òëÔ∏è in front of every line as you go.
> 

### ‚òÅÔ∏è A. Google Drive Preparation

| Step | Do This | Watch Out For |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Create a `Templates/` folder ‚Üí put every template Doc inside | Exactly **one** folder; **no** sub-folders |
| 2 | Placeholders in every Doc are **`{{UPPER_CASE}}`** | No Turkish chars or spaces |
| 3 | Wrap optional clauses with **`[[BLOCK_NAME:START]]‚Ä¶[[BLOCK_NAME:END]]`** | The `START` tag must have a **blank line above** |
| 4 | Add a `META_JSON` block at the very end | Script deletes it automatically after fill |
| 5 | Right-click Doc > **Details ‚ñ∏ Description** = 1-line human description | Shown by the bot in the list |
| 6 | Create a second `Generated/` folder (for copies) | Keeps Drive tidy |

> üîë Folder ID (long alphanumerical) = <TEMPLATE_PARENT_ID>
> 
> 
> We‚Äôll paste this into the TemplateList node next.
> 

[Simple sample template ‚Üí Template Link](https://www.notion.so/Simple-sample-template-Template-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8070beacd034ba6f557f?pvs=21)

---

### üõ† B. Import the Workflow into n8n

```bash
Settings ‚ñ∏ Import Workflow ‚ñ∏ DocAgent.json

```

If nodes look **Broken** afterwards ‚Üí no community-node problem; you only need to select credentials.

---

### üìë C. Customize the TemplateList Node

1. Open **Template List** node ‚öôÔ∏è ‚Üí replace
    
    `'%3CYOUR_PARENT_ID%3E' in parents`
    
    with the real **folder ID** in the **URL**.
    
2. Right-click node > **Execute Node**.
3. Copy the entire JSON response.
4. In the editor paste it into:
    - **DocAgent** ‚Üí *System Prompt* (top)
    - **User Choice Match Check** ‚Üí *System Prompt* (top)
        
        Save.
        

> ‚ö†Ô∏è Why manual? Caching the list saves LLM tokens. Whenever you add a template, rerun the node and update the prompts.
> 

---

### üîó D. Deploy the Apps Script

| Step | Screen | Note |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Open Gist files **GetMetaData.gs** + **FillDocument.gs** ‚Üí *File ‚ñ∏ Make a copy* | Both files may live in one project |
| 2 | *Project Settings* > enable **Google Docs API** ‚úîÔ∏è & **Google Drive API** ‚úîÔ∏è | Otherwise you‚Äôll see 403 errors |
| 3 | *Deploy ‚ñ∏ New deployment ‚ñ∏ Web app* |  |
| ‚Ä¢ Execute as | **Me** |  |
| ‚Ä¢ Who has access | **Anyone** |  |
| 4 | On the consent screen allow scopes:‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¶/auth/documents`‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¶/auth/drive` | Click **Advanced ‚Ä∫ Go** if Google warns |
| 5 | Copy the **Web App URL** (e.g. `https://script.google.com/macros/s/ABC123/exec`) | If this URL changes, update n8n |

[Apps Script source code ‚Üí Notion Link](https://www.notion.so/Apps-Script-source-code-Notion-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8015a280d90de16c031f?pvs=21)

---

### üîß E. Wire the Script URL in n8n

| Node | Field | Action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **GetMetaData** | *URL* | `<WEB_APP_URL>?mode=meta&id={{ $json["id"] }}` |
| **FillDocument** | *URL* | `<WEB_APP_URL>` |

> üí° Prefer using an .env file? Add GAS_WEBAPP_URL=‚Ä¶ and reference it as {{ $env.GAS_WEBAPP_URL }}.
> 

---

### üîê F. Add Credentials

- **Google Drive OAuth2** ‚Üí *Drive API (v3) Full Access*
- **Google Docs OAuth2** ‚Üí same account
- **LLM key** (OpenAI / Gemini)
- (Optional) **Postgres Chat Memory** credential for the corresponding node

---

### üß™ G. First Run (Smoke Test)

1. Switch the workflow **Active**.
2. In the chat panel type `/start`.
3. Bot lists templates ‚Üí pick one.
4. Fill mandatory fields, optionally toggle blocks ‚Üí **Confirm**.
5. **üîó Download PDF** link appears ‚Üí ‚òëÔ∏è setup complete.

---

### ‚ùå H. Common Errors & Fixes

| üÜò Error | Likely Cause | Remedy |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `403: Apps Script permission denied` | Web app access set to *User* | Redeploy as **Anyone**, re-authorize scopes |
| `placeholder validation failed` | Missing required field | Provide the listed values ‚Üí rerun DocProcess |
| `unknown placeholders: ‚Ä¶` | Template vs. agent mismatch | Check placeholder spelling (UPPER_CASE ASCII) |
| `Template ID not found` | Prompt list is old | Rerun **TemplateList** ‚Üí update both prompts |
| `Cannot find META_JSON` | No meta block / wrong tag | Add `[[META_JSON_START]] ‚Ä¶ [[META_JSON_END]]`, retry |

---

### ‚úÖ Final Checklist

- [ ]  Drive folder structure & template rules ready
- [ ]  Workflow imported, folder ID set in node
- [ ]  TemplateList output pasted into both prompts
- [ ]  Apps Script deployed, URL set in nodes
- [ ]  OAuth credentials & LLM key configured
- [ ]  `/start` test passes, PDF link received

---

## üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Need Help with Customizations?

Reach out for consulting & support on LinkedIn: [**√ñzg√ºr Karateke**](https://www.notion.so/DocAgent-Documentation-22b3f8a1e57f8085baa9c70cdead41cd?source=copy_link)

[Full Documentation ‚Üí Notion](https://www.notion.so/Simple-sample-template-Template-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8070beacd034ba6f557f?pvs=21)

[Simple sample template ‚Üí Template Link](https://www.notion.so/Simple-sample-template-Template-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8070beacd034ba6f557f?pvs=21)

[Apps Script source code ‚Üí Notion Link](https://www.notion.so/Apps-Script-source-code-Notion-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8015a280d90de16c031f?pvs=21)

parameters.name: id
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters1_Value', `The id of the template requested by the user comes here.`, 'string') }}

options.systemMessage: =You are ‚ÄúLegal-Doc Agent‚Äù, an expert that drafts professional Turkish documents from fixed Google Docs templates. {{ YOUR_MANUAL_TO_ADD_TEMPLATE_LIST }} #TOOLS AND USAGE RULES GetMetaData(id) ‚Üí { placeholders\[], conditionals\[] } DocProcess(user_choice_name, user_choice_id, data{}) ‚Üí (Call a tool by replying ONLY with {"tool":"ToolName","params":{...}} ) #FLOW step-1 Determine which document in the templateCatalog the user wants to create. step-2 Call GetMetaData with the identified id. ‚Üí You get back: ‚Ä¢ metadata.placeholders (global/static placeholders) ‚Ä¢ metadata.conditionals[] (each has flag, label, help, placeholders[]) step-3 Request the necessary information from the user: a) For each name in metadata.placeholders, ask ‚ÄúWhat is ? ‚Äù b) For each item in metadata.conditionals: i. Ask ‚ÄúWould you like to include the

parameters.description: Call this tool for Doc Process

parameters.content:
## Manual Template List Retrieval
**The response returned from this API request is manually added to the system prompt.
**It is preferred for more consistent memory management. Other alternatives can also be tried.
**Metadata of the template selected by the user is dynamically retrieved.

## Description  

## 1 ‚Äî What Does It Do / Which Problem Does It Solve?

This workflow turns Google Docs-based contract & form templates into **ready-to-sign PDFs in minutes**‚Äîall from a single chat flow.

- **Automates repetitive document creation.** Instead of copying a rental, sales, or NDA template and filling it by hand every time, the bot asks for the required values and fills them in.
- **Eliminates human error.** It lists every mandatory field so nothing is missed, and removes unnecessary clauses via conditional blocks.
- **Speeds up approvals.** The final draft arrives as a direct PDF link‚Äîone click to send for signing.
- **One template ‚Üí unlimited variations.** Every new template you drop in Drive is auto-listed with **zero workflow edits‚Äî**it scales effortlessly.
- **100 % no-code.** Runs on n8n + Google Apps Script‚Äîno extra backend, self-hosted or cloud.

---

## 2 ‚Äî How It Works (Detailed Flow)

1. üìù **Template Discovery**
    
    üìÇ The **TemplateList** node scans the Drive folder you specify via the `?mode=meta` endpoint and returns an `id / title / desc` list. The bot shows this list in chat.
    
2. üéØ **Selection & Metadata Fetch**
    
    The user types a template name.
    
    üîç **GetMetaData** opens the chosen Doc, extracts `META_JSON`, placeholders, and conditional blocks, then lists mandatory & optional fields.
    
3. üó£ **Data-Collection Loop**
    - The bot asks for every **placeholder** value.
    - For each **conditional block** it asks üü¢ **Yes** / üî¥ **No**.
        
        Answers are accumulated in a `data` JSON object.
        
4. ‚úÖ **Final Confirmation**
    
    The bot summarizes the inputs ‚Üí when the user clicks **Confirm**, the *DocProcess* sub-workflow starts.
    
5. ‚öôÔ∏è **DocProcess Sub-Workflow**
    
    
    | üîß Step | Node | Task |
    | --- | --- | --- |
    | 1 | **User Choice Match Check** | Verifies name‚ÄìID match; throws if wrong |
    | 2 | **GetMetaData (renew)** | Gets the latest placeholder list |
    | 3 | **Validate JSON Format** | Checks for missing / unknown fields |
    | 4 | **CopyTemplate** | Copies the Doc via Drive API |
    | 5 | **FillDocument** | Apps Script fills placeholders & removes blocks |
    | 6 | **Generate PDF Link** | Builds an `export?format=pdf` URL |
6. üìé **Delivery**
    
    The master agent sends **üîó Download PDF** & **‚úèÔ∏è Open Google Doc** links.
    
7. üö´ **Error Paths**
    - `status:"ERROR", missing:[‚Ä¶]` ‚Üí bot lists missing fields and re-asks.
    - `unknown:[‚Ä¶]` ‚Üí template list is outdated; rerun *TemplateList*.
    - Any Apps Script error ‚Üí the returned `message` is shown verbatim in chat.

---

## 3 ‚Äî üöÄ Setup Steps (Full Checklist)

> Goal: Get a flawless PDF on the first run.
> 
> 
> Mentally **tick** the ‚òëÔ∏è in front of every line as you go.
> 

### ‚òÅÔ∏è A. Google Drive Preparation

| Step | Do This | Watch Out For |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Create a `Templates/` folder ‚Üí put every template Doc inside | Exactly **one** folder; **no** sub-folders |
| 2 | Placeholders in every Doc are **`{{UPPER_CASE}}`** | No Turkish chars or spaces |
| 3 | Wrap optional clauses with **`[[BLOCK_NAME:START]]‚Ä¶[[BLOCK_NAME:END]]`** | The `START` tag must have a **blank line above** |
| 4 | Add a `META_JSON` block at the very end | Script deletes it automatically after fill |
| 5 | Right-click Doc > **Details ‚ñ∏ Description** = 1-line human description | Shown by the bot in the list |
| 6 | Create a second `Generated/` folder (for copies) | Keeps Drive tidy |

> üîë Folder ID (long alphanumerical) = <TEMPLATE_PARENT_ID>
> 
> 
> We‚Äôll paste this into the TemplateList node next.
> 

[Simple sample template ‚Üí Template Link](https://www.notion.so/Simple-sample-template-Template-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8070beacd034ba6f557f?pvs=21)

---

### üõ† B. Import the Workflow into n8n

```bash
Settings ‚ñ∏ Import Workflow ‚ñ∏ DocAgent.json

```

If nodes look **Broken** afterwards ‚Üí no community-node problem; you only need to select credentials.

---

### üìë C. Customize the TemplateList Node

1. Open **Template List** node ‚öôÔ∏è ‚Üí replace
    
    `'%3CYOUR_PARENT_ID%3E' in parents`
    
    with the real **folder ID** in the **URL**.
    
2. Right-click node > **Execute Node**.
3. Copy the entire JSON response.
4. In the editor paste it into:
    - **DocAgent** ‚Üí *System Prompt* (top)
    - **User Choice Match Check** ‚Üí *System Prompt* (top)
        
        Save.
        

> ‚ö†Ô∏è Why manual? Caching the list saves LLM tokens. Whenever you add a template, rerun the node and update the prompts.

---

### üîó D. Deploy the Apps Script

| Step | Screen | Note |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Open Gist files **GetMetaData.gs** + **FillDocument.gs** ‚Üí *File ‚ñ∏ Make a copy* | Both files may live in one project |
| 2 | *Project Settings* > enable **Google Docs API** ‚úîÔ∏è & **Google Drive API** ‚úîÔ∏è | Otherwise you‚Äôll see 403 errors |
| 3 | *Deploy ‚ñ∏ New deployment ‚ñ∏ Web app* |  |
| ‚Ä¢ Execute as | **Me** |  |
| ‚Ä¢ Who has access | **Anyone** |  |
| 4 | On the consent screen allow scopes:‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¶/auth/documents`‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¶/auth/drive` | Click **Advanced ‚Ä∫ Go** if Google warns |
| 5 | Copy the **Web App URL** (e.g. `https://script.google.com/macros/s/ABC123/exec`) | If this URL changes, update n8n |

[Apps Script source code ‚Üí Notion Link](https://www.notion.so/Apps-Script-source-code-Notion-Link-22b3f8a1e57f8015a280d90de16c031f?pvs=21)

---

### üîß E. Wire the Script URL in n8n

| Node | Field | Action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **GetMetaData** | *URL* | `<WEB_APP_URL>?mode=meta&id={{ $json["id"] }}` |
| **FillDocument** | *URL* | `<WEB_APP_URL>` |

> üí° Prefer using an .env file? Add GAS_WEBAPP_URL=‚Ä¶ and reference it as {{ $env.GAS_WEBAPP_URL }}.
> 

---

### üîê F. Add Credentials

- **Google Drive OAuth2** ‚Üí *Drive API (v3) Full Access*
- **Google Docs OAuth2** ‚Üí same account
- **LLM key** (OpenAI / Gemini)
- (Optional) **Postgres Chat Memory** credential for the corresponding node

---

### üß™ G. First Run (Smoke Test)

1. Switch the workflow **Active**.
2. In the chat panel type `/start`.
3. Bot lists templates ‚Üí pick one.
4. Fill mandatory fields, optionally toggle blocks ‚Üí **Confirm**.
5. **üîó Download PDF** link appears ‚Üí ‚òëÔ∏è setup complete.

---

### ‚ùå H. Common Errors & Fixes

| üÜò Error | Likely Cause | Remedy |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `403: Apps Script permission denied` | Web app access set to *User* | Redeploy as **Anyone**, re-authorize scopes |
| `placeholder validation failed` | Missing required field | Provide the listed values ‚Üí rerun DocProcess |
| `unknown placeholders: ‚Ä¶` | Template vs. agent mismatch | Check placeholder spelling (UPPER_CASE ASCII) |
| `Template ID not found` | Prompt list is old | Rerun **TemplateList** ‚Üí update both prompts |
| `Cannot find META_JSON` | No meta block / wrong tag | Add `[[META_JSON_START]] ‚Ä¶ [[META_JSON_END]]`, retry |

---

### ‚úÖ Final Checklist

- [ ]  Drive folder structure & template rules ready
- [ ]  Workflow imported, folder ID set in node
- [ ]  TemplateList output pasted into both prompts
- [ ]  Apps Script deployed, URL set in nodes
- [ ]  OAuth credentials & LLM key configured
- [ ]  `/start` test passes, PDF link received

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
